Alpha Tester.description: Awarded to everyone who joined before or on the 7th of June, 2019 (AEST).

Capture The Flag.description: This badge is stolen by successful attacks. It is automatically set as your active badge, and you can't change it until it is lost; it also sets your name to yellow, so everyone knows you have it. Only one exists.

Gold Horde.description: You purchased this badge for 1000 gold.

King Of The Hill.description: You held your position at the top of the game ladder for a whole day.
